description: SET THE WORLD ON FIRE!!
Stairs appears, HAHA!!!
message:
<color_light_green>H A H A
Stairs go<color_red>appears</color></color>

description: HAHA!!!
message:
<color_light_green>H A H A
Building go<color_red>ka-boooooom!</color></color>

description: Herb stuns you
Herb relieves your pain!
Mild healing thanks to the Mild Curing Herb
message: You consume the herb and your wounds are slightly healed up!

description: Medium healing thanks to the Medium Curing Herb
message: You consume the herb and you feel well-healed to a certain extent!

description: Strong healing thanks to the Strong Curing Herb
message: You consume the herb and you feel very well healed!

description: Teleports the user to an attuned gate.
message: You teleport to the attuned gate!

//: Let's push the charger back from the player. This does work SOMETIMES, and this'll prevent the glitch to occur.
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster stops by the target.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster strikes the weakpoint, applying stunned effect for 3 turns.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster gains momentum, increasing movement speed, hit chance and impact damage as it takes effect.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sprints toward the target. This is casted randomly between 15 to 25 times.'

Target spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster locks it's line of sight onto the target, then casts one of the Spell(s).'

Target spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster locks it's line of sight onto the target, then casts the Spell(s).'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster gains momentum, increasing movement speed, hit chance and impact damage as it takes effect.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sprints toward the target. This is casted randomly between 20 to 30 times.'

Target spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster locks it's line of sight onto the target, then casts one of the Spell(s).'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster barfs at the target, dealing acid damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'After an accurate slash, caster's bladed tendril becomes wilder in motion, randomly slicing through the air that deals cutting damage to all affected targets.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster swipes it's bladed tendril to it's target in a cone, dealing cutting damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster barfs at the target, dealing acid damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's tentacle slaps the target, dealing bash damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster barfs at the target, dealing acid damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's tentacle strikes the target wth it's pincer end, dealing cut damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster leaps towards it's target and slashes them with it's arm-blade that deals high cutting damage then the caster leaps back to the same position where he initially was'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster's head stretches towards it's target, biting them that deals high cutting damage'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures a rain of bright purple flaming orbs at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster finds the weak spot of their target and gracefully strikes it'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster takes a precise aim and launches a heavy purple plasma shot at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures a bright enormous purple violently exploding orb at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures bright purple rays of strange lasers at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures a small bright green vortex at their target which turns into a blast'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster finds the weak spot of their target and hacks it violently'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster takes a precise aim and launches a heavy green plasma shot at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures a bright enormous green violently exploding orb at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures bright green rays of strange lasers at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster conjures a bright azure-blue nebula which explodes violently upon reaching their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster finds the weak spot of their target and cuts it with almost a surgical precision'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster takes a precise aim and launches a heavy azure-blue plasma shot at their target'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster finds the weak spot of their target and mangles it with full force'
